name: epoch-seconds
description: Returns the amount of seconds passed since Unix epoch (1970).
author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

scripts.test: npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production MAIN=dist/package/production/index.js jest
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/index.js jest
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:dev && DEBUG="$npm_package_name,$npm_package_name:*" NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/index.js jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles
scripts.debug: npm run build:dev && DEBUG="$npm_package_name,$npm_package_name:*" NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/index.js jest --colors --runInBand
